# ViVi Robot

ViVi Robot is a smart WiFi Robot, developed by DOIT China, in Shenzhen.

![github](http://img2.ph.126.net/tX0NVIYDyqUaKGclQFXwbQ==/6632427861584121044.png "ViVi Robot")

Homepage: www.doit.am

![github](https://camo.githubusercontent. "DOIT")

# QUICK START

1. Download and install ViVi Robot App

The App support for both Android device and iOS device, including phone and tablet. 
You can download ViVi Robot App for Android from the following links:

	* https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.doit.scenography&hl=zh_CN
	* https://www.pgyer.com/qIYq

Download ViVi Robot App for iOS from the App Store:

	* https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/vivi-robot/id1255421040?l=zh&ls=1&mt=8

2. Connect your phone to Robot¡¯s AP

The Robot works as AP. When ViVi Robot power up, wait for about 5 seconds, you can connect 
your phone with the Robot AP by changing WiFi SSID to the Robot AP, whose SSID shown as "ViVi-xxxx".
